      • Pizza

        public Pizza(java.lang.String des,
     Size size,
     PizzaType type,
     java.math.BigDecimal price)
        Instantiates a new pizza. Used by the 'createNewPizza' method in Order
        Parameters:
        des - The description of the pizza - Automatically set to "Pizza"
        size - The size of the pizza - Represented by Size
        type - The type of pizza - Represented by PizzaType
        price - The price of the pizza - Automatically set depending on size
